tool_description: Our Text Translation API allows seamless translation of any text content across a wide range of languages, facilitating efficient and accurate global communication.
name: Translate Text
title: Translate Text

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: Translate text from a language to another.

required_parameters.name: target
required_parameters.description: Target language code (e.g. en, de, hi, pl, zh)

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: Source language code (e.g. auto, en, de, hi, pl, zh)
